name: ZenRain
0:
”Alexa open zen rain”
”Alexa ask zen rain to play for 30 minutes”
”Alexa stop”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: zen rain
des:
Enhance sleep and focus with Zen Rain! Listen to this soft drizzle rain over a beautiful japanese zen garden. 

All you need to do is say Alexa start Zen Rain, and she will play the track for 30 minutes. This is a perfect skill to use for relaxation and meditation, or to tune in and focus on your work.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
